articles.description: Shoppers have had a strong reaction to the decision - which will affect more than 500 of the supermarket's items
articles.content: Earlier today one of the UK's most popular supermarket announced plans to ban labels on 500 of its products. It is following in the footsteps of Morrisons and M&S - who have already made a simila… [+4720 chars]
